item.title: Contact form
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
<input
				type="text"
				class="mf-input mf-conditional-input"
				id="mf-input-text-bceb111"
				name="mf-first-name"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your name`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					onBlur=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-first-name'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el =>{
												parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)
					}}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-first-name"
					as=${html``}
					/>
			<input 
				type="email" 
				defaultValue="" 
				class="mf-input mf-conditional-input" 
				id="mf-input-email-881f064" 
				name="mf-email" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your email address`) } " 
				onBlur=${parent.handleChange} onFocus=${parent.handleChange} aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-email'] ? 'true' : 'false' } 
				ref=${el=> parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","emailMessage":"Please enter a valid Email address","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)}
							/>
						<${validation.ErrorMessage} 
				errors=${validation.errors} 
				name="mf-email" 
				as=${html``}
			/>
			<input
				type="text"
				class="mf-input mf-conditional-input"
				id="mf-input-text-a6d3d12"
				name="mf-subject"
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your subject`) } "
									onInput=${parent.handleChange}
					onBlur=${parent.handleChange}
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-subject'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${el =>{
												parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)
					}}
								/>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-subject"
					as=${html``}
					/>
			<textarea id="mf-input-text-area-fffa11a"
				name="mf-comment" 
				placeholder="${ parent.decodeEntities(`Your message`) } "
				cols="30" rows="10"
									onInput=${ parent.handleChange }
					aria-invalid=${validation.errors['mf-comment'] ? 'true' : 'false'}
					ref=${ el => parent.activateValidation({"message":"This field is required.","minLength":1,"maxLength":"","type":"none","required":true,"expression":"null"}, el)}
								></textarea>
							<${validation.ErrorMessage}
					errors=${validation.errors}
					name="mf-comment"
					as=${html``}
					/>
							<button type="submit" id="">
					${ parent.decodeEntities(`Send Message`) } 
				</button>

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Meet your co-pilot

Automate your contentimageinvoice generation.

Cost-effective solution to generate text in seconds and increasing your conversion rate.

Build your app Free Trial - No Credit Card Required Join 10K Customers MEET YOUR CO-PILOT

Say goodbye to writer's block and get more done.

AI Powered Results

Generate, edit and publish unique content by using AI platforms powered by ChatGPT 4, Babbage, Ada or Dall-E. 

Learn more
Payment Gateways

Securely process credit card, debit card, or other electronic payment methods by using PayPal, Square, Payoneer

Learn more
MultiLingual

Ability to understand and generate content in different languages allows businesses to expand their reach and appeal to a wider audience.

Learn more
Support Platform

Our tools can help you generate any kind of content from product descriptions and blog posts to email newsletters and social media updates.

Learn more AI-POWERED

Meet your new intelligent AI Assistant.

Advanced text editor that supports rich text formatting Real-time suggestions and corrections for grammar, punctuation, and style while you are editing.

1

Live Text Editor.

Ability to understand and generate content in different languages allows businesses to expand their reach and appeal to a wider audience.

  • Dall-E, GPT or Ada
  • Unlimited Generation
  • Multilingual
2

Track Analytics

Ability to understand and generate content in different languages allows businesses to expand their reach and appeal to a wider audience.

3

+30 Languages

Ability to understand and generate content in different languages allows businesses to expand their reach and appeal to a wider audience.

4

Security and compliance

Ability to understand and generate content in different languages allows businesses to expand their reach and appeal to a wider audience.

WHAT'S NEW

Meet your new intelligent AI Assistant.

Select an AI Platform and Input some basic information about your idea, brand, product, or service, and the AI would generate a unique, engaging piece of content in seconds.

Ability to generate content in different languages.

Track a wide range of data points, including traffic, user behavior, sales revenue, and control user access.

Monitor User Spendings and Balance

Create your own template or use pre-made templates and examples for various content types and industries to help you get started quickly.

Full Affiliate/Referral System

Securely process credit card or other electronic payment methods by using payment gateways.

Flexible Pricing.

Flexible and affording plans tailored to your needs. Save up to %20 for a limited time.

Monthly Yearly
Basic
$29/month Join This Plan The cheapest way to get started.
  • 300 Words
  • Limited Use
  • Volume Based Pricing
  • Analytics and Reporting
  • API Access
Standard
$49/month Join This Plan

The most popular plan.

  • 300 Words

$89/month Join This Plan

Contact us for more information.

Basic
$300/year Join This Plan The cheapest way to get started.
  • 300 Words

Standard
$569/year Join This Plan

The most popular plan.

  • 300 Words

  • Analytics and Reporting
  • API Access
Enterprise
$999/year Join This Plan

Contact us for more information.

  • 300 Words
  • Limited Use
  • Volume Based Pricing
  • Analytics and Reporting
  • API Access
JOIN THE COMMUNITY

Trusted by millions in 40+ countries.

Advanced text editor that supports rich text formatting Real-time suggestions and corrections for grammar, punctuation, and style while you are editing.

JOIN THE WAITLIST

Supercharge your content generation process.

Join us today and experience the power of AI-powered  text creation for yourself!

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials

Check out these testimonials of our AI writing tool

Emily Perez

As someone who has been working in content creation for years, I can honestly say that the level of sophistication and accuracy that this AI technology is capable of is truly impressive.

David Johnson

I was absolutely blown away by the quality of the content generated by this AI Text website. AI technology is capable of is truly impressive. Really great user experience!

John Thompson

As a content marketer, I'm always looking for ways to streamline my workflow and create high-quality content at scale. This AI generator has been a game-changer for me, and I don't know how I ever managed without it.

Emily Perez

I can't imagine going back to writing without this AI tool. It's made the process so much smoother and faster.

David Johnson

I was skeptical at first, but after trying out this AI generator, I'm a believer. The flexibility and customization options are fantastic, and I love how it can adapt to different writing styles and topics.

John Thompson

I've tried other AI writing tools before, but this one is by far the best. The language is sophisticated and engaging, and it's helped me take my content to the next level.

Join 10K Customers

JOIN THE WAITLIST

Supercharge your content generation process.

Join us today and experience the power of AI-powered  text creation for yourself!

item.title: What customer service processes provide
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

Improve your communication and skills

Hustle and Cash is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

  • Get yourself comfortable.
  • Manage your workspace and organize your desk.
  • Adjust the work/life balance.
  • Keep In touch with your co-workers.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

item.title: Best Practices and Common Pitfalls of AI
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

Improve your communication and skills

What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

  • Get yourself comfortable.
  • Manage your workspace and organize your desk.
  • Adjust the work/life balance.
  • Keep In touch with your co-workers.

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

item.title: Powerful AI Model switches to quantum PC
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

Improve your communication and skills

Hustle and Cash is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

  • Get yourself comfortable.
  • Manage your workspace and organize your desk.
  • Adjust the work/life balance.
  • Keep In touch with your co-workers.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

item.title: Best Practices and Common Pitfalls of AI
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

Improve your communication and skills

Hustle and Cash is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

  • Get yourself comfortable.
  • Manage your workspace and organize your desk.
  • Adjust the work/life balance.
  • Keep In touch with your co-workers.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

item.title: Powerful AI Model switches to quantum PC
item.dc:creator: aihub
item.content:encoded:
Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

Improve your communication and skills

Hustle and Cash is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

  • Get yourself comfortable.
  • Manage your workspace and organize your desk.
  • Adjust the work/life balance.
  • Keep In touch with your co-workers.

How can I control my budget?

Hustle and Cashflow is a blog that aims to educate millennials on personal finance. What allows to differ from other personal finance blogs, is how we chose to communicate bersonal finance and money to millennials using humour and relatable language while providing quality information about how to deal with money and sharing stories of young people overcoming their financial struggle

It often make reference to pop culture and the latest internet jokes, allowing our readers to have a place to learn and develop a sense of community.

End-to-end encryption for business messages for iOS Devices

End-to-end encryption is a security feature that ensures that only the sender and recipient of a message can read its contents. With the latest update of iOS devices, businesses can now use end-to-end encryption for their messages, providing an additional layer of protection to their communication. This feature ensures that the messages are secure and can only be accessed by authorized parties.

Sending media, documents, location and contacts

The ability to send media, documents, location, and contacts has become an integral part of messaging. With the latest updates in messaging platforms, users can now send a variety of media types. From photos and videos to documents and contacts, messaging platforms have made it easier for users to share information and stay connected.

Get insights on key metrics like response time and issue volume

Businesses rely on key metrics to track their performance and make informed decisions. With the latest messaging platforms, businesses can now get insights on key metrics like response time and issue volume. These insights can help businesses optimize their messaging strategy, improve their customer support, and enhance their overall communication.

Calling unavailable in some countries

While messaging platforms have made it easier to stay connected, there are still some limitations. In some countries, calling may not be available due to regulatory restrictions. However, messaging platforms continue to provide a variety of features to stay connected, including messaging, video calling, and screen sharing.

Problems sending or receiving messages

Messaging platforms are designed to make communication easier and more efficient. However, sometimes users may encounter problems sending or receiving messages. This can be due to a variety of factors, such as network connectivity issues or server outages. If you encounter such problems, it is best to check your network connection and ensure that your app is up to date.

How to restore your chat history?

Chat history can be important, and losing it can be frustrating. However, messaging platforms have made it easier to restore chat history. If you have lost your chat history, you can restore it by following a few simple steps. First, ensure that you have the latest version of the app installed. Then, log in to your account and follow the prompts to restore your chat history. It is important to note that chat history can only be restored if it was previously backed up.

encryption for business messages for iOS Devices","content":"

End-to-end encryption is a security feature that ensures that only the sender and recipient of a message can read its contents. With the latest update of iOS devices, businesses can now use end-to-end encryption for their messages, providing an additional layer of protection to their communication. This feature ensures that the messages are secure and can only be accessed by authorized parties.<\/p>","_id":"43dc7bf"},{"title":"Sending media, documents, location and contacts","content":"

The ability to send media, documents, location, and contacts has become an integral part of messaging. With the latest updates in messaging platforms, users can now send a variety of media types. From photos and videos to documents and contacts, messaging platforms have made it easier for users to share information and stay connected.<\/p>","_id":"a0cfcf6"},{"_id":"15bb484","title":"Get insights on key metrics like response time and issue volume","content":"

Businesses rely on key metrics to track their performance and make informed decisions. With the latest messaging platforms, businesses can now get insights on key metrics like response time and issue volume. These insights can help businesses optimize their messaging strategy, improve their customer support, and enhance their overall communication.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9cb122f","title":"Calling unavailable in some countries","content":"

While messaging platforms have made it easier to stay connected, there are still some limitations. In some countries, calling may not be available due to regulatory restrictions. However, messaging platforms continue to provide a variety of features to stay connected, including messaging, video calling, and screen sharing.<\/p>"},{"_id":"af8052d","title":"Problems sending or receiving messages","content":"

Messaging platforms are designed to make communication easier and more efficient. However, sometimes users may encounter problems sending or receiving messages. This can be due to a variety of factors, such as network connectivity issues or server outages. If you encounter such problems, it is best to check your network connection and ensure that your app is up to date.<\/p>"},{"_id":"9db9c70","title":"How to restore your chat history?","content":"

Chat history can be important, and losing it can be frustrating. However, messaging platforms have made it easier to restore chat history. If you have lost your chat history, you can restore it by following a few simple steps. First, ensure that you have the latest version of the app installed. Then, log in to your account and follow the prompts to restore your chat history. It is important to note that chat history can only be restored if it was previously backed up.<\/p>"}],"trigger_icon_closed":{"value":"akar-icons
